subject: Kindly contact First Capital
body:

below:

subject: Re:   Kindly contact First Capital
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about the Mobile prize you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What kind of Mobile prize is it, and how did I become eligible to claim it?

Best wishes,
Jennifer
